Ingredients.3: 2 cups tomato and clam juice cocktail (such as Clamato®)

Ingredients.6: 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce, or to taste

Ingredients.7: 1 tablespoon prepared horseradish, or to taste

Ingredients.8: 2 teaspoons finely ground black pepper, or to taste

Ingredients.9: 0.5 teaspoons hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or to taste

Ingredients.10: 1 teaspoon celery salt, or to taste

Ingredients.12: 1  lime, cut into wedges, or as needed

Directions.1: Combine vodka, tomato juice, tomato and clam juice, lemon juice, lime juice, Worcestershire sauce, horseradish, black pepper, pepper sauce, and celery salt in a large pitcher. Add ice and pour cocktail into glasses; serve each with a lime wedge.
